titles: A brief discourse concerning the three chief principles of magnificent building viz., solidity, conveniency, and ornament / by Sr. Balthazar Gerbier D'ouvilly, Knight.
author: Gerbier, Balthazar, Sir, 1592?-1667.
notes: "Printed by A.M. and are to be sold by Richard Lowns ... Thomas Heath ... and Matthew Collins ..., 1662"--P. 44.
